headline: Duke Energy (DUK): Valuation in Focus After Board Appointment and $1.75B Debt Raising
summary: If you have been watching Duke Energy (DUK) lately, you have good reason. The company just welcomed Jeffrey Guldner, a respected utility veteran, to its board of directors. In addition, it recently completed several sizable fixed-income offerings, signaling moves on both the leadership and financial fronts. For investors sizing up their next move, these events offer plenty to think about as Duke Energy adjusts its sails in a shifting market environment. This combination of board refresh and...
